import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getCurrentExpert, updateCurrentExpert } from "actions/userActions"; import SwiperCore, { Navigation, Pagination, Scrollbar, A11y, EffectCoverflow } from 'swiper'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import 'swiper/swiper.scss'; import { Button, Modal, ModalBody, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, FormGroup, Input, Row, Col, Container, Table } from "reactstrap"; import bg from "assets/img/flower-back.png"; import 'swiper/components/effect-coverflow/effect-coverflow.scss'; import 'swiper/components/navigation/navigation.scss'; import 'swiper/components/pagination/pagination.scss'; SwiperCore.use([EffectCoverflow]); SwiperCore.use([Navigation, Pagination, Scrollbar, A11y]); class Settings extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modalBank: false, modalPersonalDetails: false, modalPhotoGallery: false, modalAvailability: false, about: '', userProfile: { residential: {} } }; } componentDidMount() { const user = { expert_id: "5f89b74c785a191b10dab1ac", role: 'expert' }; this.props.getCurrentExpert(user); } toggleModalBank = () => { this.setState({ modalBank: !this.state.modalBank }); }; toggleModalGallery = () => { this.setState({ modalPhotoGallery: !this.state.modalPhotoGallery }); }; togglePersonalDetails = () => { this.setState({ modalPersonalDetails: !this.state.modalPersonalDetails }); }; toggleAvailability = () => { this.setState({ modalAvailability: !this.state.modalAvailability }); }; handleProfileUpdate = () => { const current = { currentUser: this.state.userProfile }; this.props.updateCurrentExpert(current); } onChange = e => { let obj = this.state.userProfile; obj[e.target.id] = e.target.value; this.setState({ userProfile: obj }) }; onChangeResidential = e => { let obj = this.state.userProfile; obj.residential[e.target.id] = e.target.value; this.setState({ userProfile: obj }) }; onChangeVenue = e => { let obj = this.state.userProfile; obj.venue[e.target.id] = e.target.value; this.setState({ userProfile: obj }) }; componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps) { this.setState({ userProfile: nextProps.user.payload }) } render() { console.log('-----------props.user---', this.props.user) return ( <>
Personal Details Bank Details Availability Photo Gallery

Saturday 9:00 AM–8:30 PM {" "}Unavailable {` `}

); } } function mapStateToProp(state) { return { user: state.user } } export default connect( mapStateToProp, { getCurrentExpert, updateCurrentExpert } )(Settings);
